seniority_level.evidence: 3 years minimum experience required, no explicit senior/junior in title, typical mid-level requirement

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with focus on BI/DW projects, reporting and visualization

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting and visualization using Cognos, data warehouse patterns

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of mentoring, leading teams, or direct reports; focus on individual contributor work

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms mentioned (AWS, Google, Azure) with no clear primary preference

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud providers mentioned as nice-to-have skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools mentioned (DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica) suggest batch processing patterns

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned in job description

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data storage systems mentioned (warehouse, lake, etc.)

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India indicates India timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Must be located in Pune, Maharashtra, India - implies relocation for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location in India suggests local hiring focus

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, location in India suggests local hiring

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No employment type or contract structure mentioned in job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (Cognos, UNIX) and nice-to-have (cloud platforms), balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on BI engineering with specific tools (Cognos) and clear responsibilities
